subject: Baseball
Sports Injuries
lead_paragraph: The Red Sox are over .500 without three starting pitchers, their closer, their left fielder, their center fielder, their second baseman, a backup outfielder and two setup men.
snippet: The Red Sox are over .500 without three starting pitchers, their closer, their left fielder, their center fielder, their second baseman, a backup outfielder and two setup men.
